plugins.name: code-quality
plugins.description: Automated code quality hooks: auto-fixes (ESLint/Prettier) after edits and quality gates before stopping

plugins.name: dart-lsp
plugins.description: LSP server integration for Dart files using the Dart Analysis Server

plugins.name: vue-typescript-lsp
plugins.description: TypeScript Language Server with Vue support. Handles .vue, .ts, .tsx, .js, .jsx files. Use instead of a separate TypeScript LSP for Vue projects.
